content:
Yes, most of these restaurants have vegetarian or vegan options on their menu. Here is some information on each restaurant's offerings:

- The Brown Derby: It is not clear from its current menu whether The Brown Derby has a vegetarian or vegan option, but you could contact the restaurant directly to inquire. - Musso & Frank Grill: On its menu, Musso & Frank Grill offers several vegetarian options, including salads, pasta, and a vegetarian omelet. However, it does not have many vegan options. - The Rainbow Bar and Grill: The Rainbow Bar and Grill has a vegan menu that includes burgers, tacos, and salads, among other items. - Yamashiro Hollywood: Yamashiro Hollywood has vegetarian and vegan options, including a vegetable roll, assorted vegetable tempura, and a vegan tofu teriyaki bowl. - The Polo Lounge: The Polo Lounge has vegetarian options, such as a beet salad, a tomato risotto, and a butternut squash soup. However, it does not have many vegan options.
